code: import _toConsumableArray from"/Users/jangyoungju/Desktop/webproject/homework/project/myreact/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray.js";import axios from"axios";var changeTitle=function changeTitle(e,setTitle){setTitle(e.target.value);};var changeDate=function changeDate(e,setDate){setDate(e.target.value);};var addTodo=function addTodo(title,date,completed,setTodo,setTitle,setDate,setCompleted,navigate){var regexTodo=/^(?=.*[a-zA-Z0-9!@#$%^&*()_+])(.{1,12})$/;var regexDate=/^(?!\s*$).+/;var newTodo={title:title,date:date,completed:false};setTodo(function(prevTodo){return[].concat(_toConsumableArray(prevTodo),[newTodo]);});setTitle('');setDate('');if(regexTodo.test(newTodo.title)&&regexDate.test(newTodo.date)){axios.post('http://localhost:8000/add',newTodo).then(function(res){navigate('/list');console.log(res.data);}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});}else{alert('날짜 또는 todo를 입력하지 않았습니다!');}var input=document.querySelector('.inputDate');input.value='';input=document.querySelector('.inputTitle');input.value='';};var fetchChecked=function fetchChecked(id,completed){console.log(completed);axios.post("http://localhost:8000/completed/".concat(id),{id:id,completed:completed}).then(function(res){console.log(res.data);}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};export{changeDate,changeTitle,addTodo,fetchChecked};
